resources.string: This UIM/SIM was set as default UIM/SIM card for %s. Hold and drag down the Status Bar to change the default UIM/SIM card.
[%s] UIM/SIM card data connection is enabled

"3G service is not available with this selected UIM/SIM. This may load data slower. You can change the 3G service setting under Settings > Wireless & networks > Mobile networks. Are you sure to select this UIM/SIM?"
"3G service is not available with this selected UIM/SIM. This may load data slower. You can change the 3G service setting under Settings > UIM/SIM management. Are you sure to select this UIM/SIM?"
"You must enable data roaming for this UIM/SIM first which may incur significant roaming charges! Are you sure to enable data roaming and select this UIM/SIM?"

"3G service is not available with this selected UIM/SIM. This may load data slower. You can change the 3G service setting under Settings > Wireless & networks > Mobile networks. Are you sure to select this UIM/SIM?"
"3G service is not available with this selected UIM/SIM. This may load data slower. You can change the 3G service setting under Settings > UIM/SIM management. Are you sure to select this UIM/SIM?"

"You must enable data roaming for this UIM/SIM first which may incur significant roaming charges! Besides, 3G service is not available with this UIM/SIM. This may load data slower. You can change it under Settings > Wireless & networks > Mobile networks. Are you sure to enable data roaming and select this UIM/SIM?"

"You must enable data roaming for this UIM/SIM first which may incur significant roaming charges! Besides, 3G service is not available with this UIM/SIM. This may load data slower. You can change it under Settings > UIM/SIM management. Are you sure to enable data roaming and select this UIM/SIM?"
%1$s is now turned off. Would you like to turn on this UIM/SIM card?
Slide down notification list to switch to default UIM/SIM card
